author: markt
msg: Use deployed which is known to be absolute
Also, deprecate use of getAppBase() method as it does not exist in 8.0.x and use deployed instead (deployed only needs to be absolute not canonical).

author: rhuijben
msg: (svn_ra_serf__get_lock): Following up on r1578273, only return a lock
instance when the node is really locked, as svn_ra_get_lock() documents.

author: markt
msg: The filename of a tagged war file should be  versioned + tag + baseName.war.  The "tag" part was lost.

author: markt
msg: The filename of a tagged war file should be  versioned + tag + baseName.war.  The "tag" part was lost.
